Atman

510 Battery 2.0-4.0V Adjustable Voltage

CV5015B

Log in for pricing

These 510 threaded batteries are compatible with pre-filled or refillable cartridges. Featuring four stylish colours and variable voltage, this battery is perfect for puffing.

This Atman 380mAh battery, allows you to enjoy vaping all day before recharging. Adjust the voltage between 2.0 and 4.0V depending on the type of material you’re using in your cartridge. The 510 thread size is the most common, so it will fit with the majority of available carts. The USB provides a fast charge without requiring a wall block. For safety purposes and to prevent overheating the battery stops outputting power if the draw taken is too lengthy.

To turn the device on, quickly press the button 5 times. Hold that same button down to draw. It’s personal preference whether you prefer to hold the button and heat up the material to get a massive hit, or start drawing as soon as you press the button down for a more moderate hit.

Preheat mode can be activated by rapidly clicking the button 2 times, this allows for the battery to continuously heat for 15 seconds. The device also has an auto-shutoff to prevent overheating.

Variable voltage is achieved by simply twisting the bottom of the battery to desired temperature. The voltage range is between 2.0 and 4.0 volts. Remember, different viscosity’s will vaporize better at different temperatures.

To charge the battery, screw on the charger the same way you would thread the cartridge. It is recommended to charge in a computer or a similar device. Sometimes using a wall adapter (especially a high powered one) can cause damage to the battery. The lights on the device and charger will be red while charging, and then turn off on the pen and change to green on the charger when complete.

This functional and stylish battery is available in Red, Silver, Blue and Black.

Yocan UNI Pro Digital Box Mod

CE1035AG

Log in for pricing

The Yocan UNI Pro is a universally compatible Digital Box Mod that works with all oil atomizers of all lengths and sizes. It brings vape customization and personalization to the next level.

This Patented Digital Box Mod features a chamber with adjustable width and height to ensure that all oil atomizers will fit snugly regardless of size or shape. In addition to its patented adjustable design, it also features a 10-second preheat function, a volt range of 2.0V–4.2V, and a hanging hole for easy attachment to a strap or lanyard. The bright OLED display clearly indicates voltage and remaining change, and the simple button interface allows for easy operation.

The Yocan UNI Pro Digital Box Mod celebrated for its minimalist design, amazing portability, and straightforward operation. It’s perfect for travelling and can be enjoyed by vape users at every experience level. Available in a wide variety of colors, there’s a UNI Pro for every occasion and it will still make an excellent addition to your collection. With unmatched customization and impressive performance, You’ll be vaping like a pro in no time with the UNI Pro Digital Box Mod from Yocan.

Yocan

Yocan STIX

CE3148B

Log in for pricing

YoCan is a leading manufacturer in healthy vaporizers. They stand behind the quality and innovative craftsmanship of their products and are CE, RoHS and FCC certified.

The Yocan STIX is a small, discreet, leak-proof juice pen. Easy to use, and super portable this pen is designed for vaping on the go. The ceramic coil offers a clean, smooth draw. To use the device, unscrew the base connector from the battery and then disconnect the mouthpiece from the base connector. Add your oil into the mouthpiece carefully, ensuring not to get any in the center tube. Save your base connector for extra filled pods. Turn the device upside down and screw the mouthpiece back on. To turn on the unit, click the button 5 times in under 2 seconds, and press the same button 3 times to change temperature. The sleek design utilizes a 350 mAh battery.

Yocan

Yocan Evolve Plus

CE3067BK

Log in for pricing

The Yocan Evolve Plus is a sleek, powerful yet durable little device. The 1100 mah battery allows for 15 seconds of continuous heat and because of the built-in silicone jar, the Yocan Evolve is the first multifunctional travel vape in the dab market. It is easy to charge with a micro USB and can be wall charged or plugged into your laptop for charging on the go.

Special Features:

  • Atomizer Tube
  • Coil Cap
  • Quartz Dual Coil (QDC)
  • Base
  • Battery
  • Silicone Jar

Product Specifications:

  • Material: Pure metal with quartz coils
  • Use: Concentrates only
  • Thread: Standard 510 Tread
  • Battery: Built-in 1100 mAh
  • Weight: 210g

Directions:

  1. Make sure you give your device a full charge for best initial use
  2. Remove mouthpiece and remove coil cap
  3. Put product into the coil remember not to over fill as it will cause leakage from the coil onto the battery replace coil cap and mouthpiece
  4. Turn the device on by clicking the fire button 5 times consecutively in 3 seconds
  5. For best results, please finish all your product in the bowl to prevent leaking through the coil to the top of the battery
  6. Turn off device using same method used to power it on

Product Includes:

  • 1 x Evolve Plus Atomizer
  • 1 x Evolve Plus Battery (1100 mah)
  • 1 x Replacement Dual Quartz Coil
  • 1 x Small Tool
  • 1 x Micro USB cable

Pro Tip Use a cotton swab and isopropyl alcohol to keep the top of the battery, bottom of the coil and the treads around the mouthpiece clean. The coil, cap and silicone base can be soaked in isopropyl alcohol and left to dry

Warranty Information: 6 month limited warranty.

Boundless Technology

Boundless Terp Pen

CV1051S

Log in for pricing
The Terp Pen by Boundless is an open coil based dab system, this makes it ideal for using as a nectar collector. The Terp Pen utilizes 2 ceramic coils, ensuring clean, flavourful hits. The device is inhale activated, so it starts working as soon as you draw. There is a 10 second timer to prevent overheating, so if you’d like a larger hit make sure to pause during your hit. With this device you can vape out of a jar or off of your dab tool for a true nectar collector experience. You can also preheat your unit by drawing, melt a little bit of extract roughly the size of a rice grain onto the coils and draw again – this is ideal for those monitoring their doses. This pen-sized device is perfect for beginners or experts and is available in black and silver.

Shatterizer Vaporizer

SHA10G

Log in for pricing

Shatterizer was founded in Canada by experienced consumers who wanted to make a product for new and seasoned vapors alike. They are committed to customer satisfaction, shattering expectations and of course #perfectclouds.

The Shatterizer is a concentrate vaporizer that offers a unique design and smooth hit. It’s uncomplicated to use and clean. When used properly with a full charge it can produce up to 70 hits. The aluminum bubble-like top allows the vapor to cool and leaves you with a satisfyingly smooth draw.

To turn the unit on and off simply click the button 5 times within two seconds. The same button is used to change temperature by quickly pressing it 3 times. To fill chamber, remove top piece carefully, unscrew cap and gently add concentrate, ensuring not to damage coils. While charging device, light is red and will turn off when fully charged. After 15 seconds of continuous draw, device will cut off heat and flash 8 times.

Yocan

Yocan Hive 2.0

CE3146BK

Log in for pricing

YoCan is a leading manufacturer in healthy vaporizers. They stand behind the quality and innovative craftsmanship of their products and are CE, RoHS and FCC certified.

The YoCan Hive 2.0 is a variable voltage vaporizer ideal for e-juice and concentrates. An atomizer for each is included with the unit, the clear option is used for e-juice and the silver one is for concentrates. Also included is a small, magnetic 510 thread connector, which is easily screwed onto the bottom of either mouthpiece. To turn the unit ON/OFF, quickly press the button 5 times in under 2 seconds. To toggle between voltage press the button 3 times, the higher the temperature the more lights will be lit. Hold the button down to draw. The unit will alert you of low battery by flashing all 3 lights 10 times. The three indicator lights will flash blue in a loop while charging. The first light will stop flashing when it has reached 35%, the second will stop at 70% and all three will go out when it’s fully charged.

Yocan

Yocan Armor Concentrate Vaporizer

C1001BK

Log in for pricing

Features:
380mAh Battery Capacity
QDC Technology
10-Second Pre-Heat Function
Pre-set Temperature Profiles
Fast USB Charging
Inclusive Dab Tool

The Yocan Armor Concentrate Vaporizer is a discreet and stylish pen that’s perfect for portability. Utilizing a quality battery, a simple interface, optimal pre-set temperatures and a rapid charger make this extract vaporizer an ideal choice.

The Armor has a 380mAh battery so you can have long lasting sessions between charges. It charges quickly and lasts longer than other vaporizers of similar size. The USB cable is fast-charging and allows the battery to charge completely in 30 minutes. The USB cable enables you to charge your device on the go or at home. It can obtain power in 30 seconds by plugging it into a wall outlet.

Yocan Armor is easy to use for beginners and connoisseurs alike. It has single button operation so all functions can be performed using only one button. This includes powering the device on and off, changing temperature, activating pre-heat mode, and activating the heating element.

The vaporizer uses dual quartz coil technology, quartz is an ideal material to use because it heats up quickly. This, combined with the custom heat settings offer the best balance between big hits and quality flavor. The coils and coil cap use a threaded connection, this makes them easy to replace. It also makes loading so simple it can be done on the go.

The Yocan Armor allows you to customize your session. There are 3 pre-set temperatures chosen to be ideal for concentrates which include low – 3.0V, medium – 3.5V and high – 4.0V. This provides consistent flavor and dense clouds. Material can be pre-heated so you can continuously dab for 10 seconds, or the coils can be heated before adding extracts. The heat settings can also be used to help clean the device. If coils have built up resin, use the 10 second preheat function and watch the caked-on material dissipate.

What’s in the box:
1x Armor Pen
1x Extra QDC coil
1x Pick Tool
1x USB Cable
1x Instructions Manual

CV1076

Log in for pricing

The Tokyo Smoke Luma is a rechargeable vaporizer battery designed to work with pods. The device is draw activated, so there’s no need to set temperatures or turn the unit on. It features light and haptic feedback to provide alerts. The bottom of the Luma indicates the battery life and the haptic feedback is initiated when the pod is inserted into the battery and magnetically clicks into place. The device utilizes ceramic heating, which provides optimal flavour. The USB-C cable makes charging the 300mAh battery easy and efficient. The exterior of the Luma has a one-of-a-kind feel unlike other vaporizers on the market that feels ceramic to the touch. The Luma comes in 2 different colours: Daybreak, a white design with dark speckles and Midnight, a darker colour with light flecks. The device is UL certified and is recyclable through the TerraCycle program.

The Exxus Snap VV is an oil vaporizer that allows you to change between three output voltages to enhance your vaping experience. It also comes with an easy-to-load large cartomizer to accommodate all-day-vapers. The Snap VV also include two magnetic adapter rings which are compatible with most other cartomizer brands on the market which makes replacement cartomizers are easy to find no matter where you are.

The Exxus Snap stands 3" T and is only 1" W.

Directions:

  1. Power on device by rapidly pressing the control button five times.
  2. Adjust the voltage by clicking the control button three times. The LED indicator will change colour depending on the voltage selected.
    • Red = 4.0 V
    • Green = 3.6 V
    • Blue = 3.4 V
  3. Press the control button twice to start preheating the device. Device will reach maximum temperature in only 15 seconds.
  4. Press the control button once to stop preheating.
  5. Inhale and enjoy!

  • RED 4.0 V
  • ORANGE 3.8 V
  • GREEN 3.6 V
  • BLUE 3.4 V
  1. To use preheat function, press the face plate power button rapidly 2x to begin 15 second preheat cycle

  • First, remove the Wulf Duo mouthpiece from the cartomizer

  1. Loading Concentrates

CHEECH & CHONG'S THE RIPPER CERAMIC VAPORIZER KIT

C2VP01W

Log in for pricing

The Cheech & Chong Up in Smoke Ripper Kit is a vaporizer that has been designed for enjoying your favourite wax or concentrate in a stylish portable device. The full-ceramic and coil-less atomizer is designed for even heat distribution and perfect flavour. The deep chamber can hold a good amount of your favourite product to save time with reloading. The Ripper Kit heats up quickly providing 15 seconds of continuous use.

Special Features:

  • Deep Full-ceramic and coil-less atomizer designed for even heat distribution
  • Compatible with wax and concentrates
  • Portable and stylish design
  • Lithium-ion Battery

Product Specifications:

  • Size: 4.45" x .72" x .72"
  • Battery: Internal 950 mAh
  • Voltage Output: 3.7 v, 4.2 v

Directions:

  1. Remove the mouthpiece from The Ripper to expose the heating chamber
  2. Apply a small amount of wax or concentrate product into the chamber on the ceramic heating disc
  3. Refit the Ripper mouthpiece ensuring it is completely attached
  4. To lock/unlock the Ripper, press the fire button 5 times simultaneously. The lights on the button will flash 3 times to indicate it has become locked/unlocked
  5. Press and hold the fire button and inhale slowly. To keep the Ripper at peak performance levels, it has a maximum 15 second puff duration. The power button will blink 5 times when the maximum puff duration has elapsed

Product Includes:

  • 1 x 950 mAh battery
  • 1 x Ceramic Atomizer
  • 1 x Micro USB Charging Cord
  • 1 x Dab Tool with Silicone Tip
  • 1 x User Manual
  • 1 x Collectors Box

Pro Tip Make sure you do not overfill the chamber or else once heated it will leak onto the top of the battery. Also, clean the connections on the Ripper and battery regularly to ensure a clean positive connection.
